price: 118. Ya sólo, тропа yo, okoyokaka nzala te okati na yango mpe okozalaka bolumbu te.
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna laka allā tajūʿa fīhā walā taʿrā
